[Specialized Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4756) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Incredible Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4737)

</column>

---

Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability. It gains one specialization of your choice (page 211.)

**Special** You can select this feat up to three times. Each time, add a different specialization to your companion.
